# MacGregor Ward

| area =
| class = Outer metropolitan
| coordinates =
}}
MacGregor Ward is a ward in the Brisbane City Council in Queensland, Australia. It covers MacGregor, Eight Mile Plains, Robertson, Upper Mt Gravatt and Wishart.
